name: postcss-wrap-namespace

0.0.1.name: postcss-wrap-namespace
0.0.1.description: PostCSS plugin to wrap css rules into a namespace and change the rules on html or :root in rootSelector, eg .my-selector {} to .namespace .my-selector {}, html {} to .rootSelector {}
